name: Rosalind Sedacca
offering: Article Marketing, Coach Promotion, Content Marketing, Copywriting, Copywriting Training, Life Coaching Certification, Marketing Expert
what_you_do: The Transition Bridge Podcast, hosted by Debi Ronca, focuses on navigating life's transitions through interviews with guests sharing their experiences and insights, along with expert advice on processing trauma and mindset shifts.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves individuals experiencing life transitions, particularly women in their 60s and beyond, as well as those seeking personal growth and clarity during challenging times.
signature_programs: Your Story’s Changing, Finding Purpose in Life’s Transitions, The Family Letter by Debi Ronca
current_projects: Monthly coaching group for women over 60, free clarity calls
business_focus: The Transition Bridge Podcast, hosted by Debi Ronca, focuses on navigating life's transitions through interviews with guests sharing their experiences and insights, along with expert advice on processing trauma and mindset shifts. (life coaching)
